content: To activate a new debit or credit card, you must perform a transaction at a bank ATM using the One-Time PIN sent to your registered mobile number. Alternatively, log in to Net Banking, go to 'Cards' > 'Activate PIN'.

International usage is disabled by default for security. To enable it, visit the Mobile App > Manage Card > Usage Settings > Enable International Transactions. You can set daily limits for international spend there.

If your card is lost or stolen, block it immediately. Open the Mobile App > Settings > Security > Block Card. This is instant. Alternatively, SMS 'BLOCK <Last 4 Digits>' to the official bank support number.
Standard Debit Cards: Free. Gold Credit Card: $50/year (waived if spend > $5000). Platinum Card: $100/year. Fees are deducted annually from your primary account balance.
Personal Loan Eligibility: Minimum credit score of 700 and annual income of $30,000. Required docs: ID Proof, Address Proof, last 3 months' pay slips. Interest rates start at 10.5% p.a.
Mortgage Applications require a down payment of at least 20% of the property value. Max tenure is 30 years. Pre-approval takes 5-7 working days pending property valuation.
To check your loan repayment schedule, access the 'Loans' dashboard. Recent payments are also visible in your monthly statement under transaction code 'LN-PMT'.
To make a transfer, add a beneficiary using their Account Number and Routing/IFSC code. There is a 30-minute cooling period for new beneficiaries before you can initiate a transfer.
Transfer Fees: NEFT/ACH is free. Wire Transfers cost $25 per transaction. International SWIFT transfers charge 2% of the transaction value plus a fixed $15 fee.
To close an account, you must visit the home branch in person with a valid ID and surrender any issued chequebooks and debit cards. Online closure is not currently permitted for security reasons.
If cash was not dispensed but your account was debited, file a dispute within 7 days. Go to Service Request > ATM Dispute in the app. The amount is usually reversed within T+5 working days.
Customer Care Toll-Free: 1-800-123-4567. Email: support@genai-bank.com. For urgent fraud reporting, press option 9 on the IVR immediately.
